title: Recieved the 10 year Icon but no Mystery gift.. on the 3/10
body: It's been so long since i expected to receive the gift as i don't have any reports that i know of. Please help.

replies.body:
We're handing these cases via [support tickets](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), so I recommend submitting one so we can work with you to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
